title: Which will lead to increase in MS

content.prompt: Which of the following will lead to an increase in the money supply in a country whose banking system has limited reserves?

choices.label: Open-market purchase of securities by the central bank
Increased borrowing by the federal government by issuing new bonds

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
